item.title: Bruised Lee (feb 2010) [house]
item.description: 1. Zombie Disco Squad – The Duke Sound 2. French Fries – Saurus Rhythm 3. Ricky Luna - Eyes Wide Shut 4. Renaissance Man – Fruit Loop 5. A1 Bassline – 8oh8 6. Nari, Milani, Dek 32 – Gnor! Main Mix 7. Nicky Romero – It’s Me Bitches (original mix) 8. Mowgli – London to Paris (original mix) 9. Sidney Samson – Riverside (Torro Torro remix) 10. Trevor Loveys – Back to Beat 11. Beni - Maximus 12. Momma’s Boy – Give It Up 13. Goshi Goshi – The Lock Shot 14. Jeff Doubleau - Woman 15. Justin Martin & Claude VonStroke – Beat That Bird 16. Ali Love – Love Harder (Jaymo & Andy George’s Moda Mix) 17. Mini K – Jack Off Jill 18. Wonk – Jump (original) 19. Young Nutz – Scratch Like This (original mix) 20. The Deficient - Dem Thief My Herb (Kitch n Sync Remix) 21. Partysquad – Murderer (original mix) 22. Ladybox – Cookies Fly 23. Tittsworth - WTF (feat. Kid sister and Pase) 24. George Lenton – Sorry (original mix)

item.title: Closer to Maybe (June 2009) [HOUSE]
item.description: 60 minutes of down n durty durty house music to shake your honeybun to Closer to Maybe (tracklist) (1) Seguindo Sonhos - Vamos Mecher (Edu K Remix) (2) Too Cool for School (Original Mix) – Don Diablo (3) We Don't Give a Fuck – DJ Kid Kaio (4) Touch My Horn - Jesse Rose (5) Hype The Funk (Remix) - Weekend Players (6) Tuned In Live - Jaymo (7) Make Your Body Jack – Jay Robinson feat Mr. Eyez (Bill Eff Mix) (8) JF - Suckaz (9) Hardcore Girls - The Count And Sinden feat. Rye Rye (10) My Neck My Knobb - Sqzmylmns (11) Fascination (Count Of Monte Cristal And Sinden Remix) - Alphabeat (12) Body Baby - Pharoahe Monch (13) Party Works (1 Fish Two Fish 2.0 Remix) - Donnis (14) Punching - Blatta & Inesha (15) Website - Tonka (Malente Re-Edit) (16) Samo Ti - Fagget Fairys (AC Slater Remix) (17) Rock It Out - AC Slater (18) Karate – Don Rimini (19) What (Boy 8-Bit mix) (20) Jumpin' N' Pumpin' 2.0 - Idiot Savant (21) Who's Your Daddy (Roger Punari RMX) - Don Diablo (22) Eurovision 1 - Zombie Disco Squad (23) Egg Yolks Yo - Lewis Cancut (24) Got U Dancing (Jack Beats RMX) - Lady Soveign (25) I Don't Want to (Jack Beats RMX) - Example (26) What Does it Mean (Don Diablo RMX) (27) Dumb Party (Original Mix) – Spencer & Hill (28) Caked (Original Mix) – Harvard Bass (29) Miserable Girl (Royal Rumble Edit) - Soulwax (30) Miss Your Tape (The Phantom's Revenge Remix) - Pierce (31) Shrimp And White Wine - Phantoms (32) Something About Us (Eastar RMX) - DaftPunk (33) Karate - Kennedy (34) Willing - Top Billin

item.title: Movin' On Up (2007?) [HOUSE/BREAKS/BMORE]
item.description: An exploration into non-hip-hop and non-dnb territory, which is quite a departure for me having been reared on jungle. A little Bmore on here (after blasting out of the starting blocks with a little disco joint) and some house/breaks. I'll put up the rest of the tracklisting shortly. 1. Dim All the Lights - Donna Summer (presented by Notolious) 2. Move up Curtis Mayfield (bmore rmx) 3. Black Betty - RAM JAM (tougher than feathers rmx) 4. Running Away 5. On the Hustle vs The Way you make me feel
item.dc:creator: DJ Kulio
item.itunes:summary:
An exploration into non-hip-hop and non-dnb territory, which is quite a departure for me having been reared on jungle. A little Bmore on here (after blasting out of the starting blocks with a little disco joint) and some house/breaks. I'll put up the rest of the tracklisting shortly.
1. Dim All the Lights - Donna Summer (presented by Notolious) 2. Move up Curtis Mayfield (bmore rmx) 3. Black Betty - RAM JAM (tougher than feathers rmx) 4. Running Away 5. On the Hustle vs The Way you make me feel

item.title: Ghetto Jazz (November 2002) [HIP-HOP/DNB]
item.description: This seems to be one of the mixes of mine people tend to like the most. Starts out choppin up some bumpin hip-hop cuts and then drops into drumnbass/jungle. This is mad old, i mixed this in 2002. I'll post a tracklisting eventually.
item.dc:creator: DJ Kulio
item.itunes:summary: This seems to be one of the mixes of mine people tend to like the most. Starts out choppin up some bumpin hip-hop cuts and then drops into drumnbass/jungle. This is mad old, i mixed this in 2002. I'll post a tracklisting eventually.

item.title: Wax(ing) Concentration (08-23-2003) [DNB/JUNGLE]
item.description: This is all drumnbass and was actually a set that consisted mostly (maybe even exclusively, it's been awhile since i listened to it) of vinyl loaned to me by a friend. It was mixed in April 2003. A mad dosage of jump-up and funky-dnb for your listening pleasure! Massive!
item.dc:creator: DJ Kulio
item.itunes:summary: This is all drumnbass and was actually a set that consisted mostly (maybe even exclusively, it's been awhile since i listened to it) of vinyl loaned to me by a friend. It was mixed in April 2003. A mad dosage of jump-up and funky-dnb for your listening pleasure! Massive!

item.title: The (re)Birth of Kool(io) [HIP-HOP]
item.description: DJing saved my life...nuff said
item.dc:creator: DJ Kulio

item.title: For my Pop (father's day 2008) [FUNKY/SOULFUL BREAKS]
item.description: Some soulful breaks and beats (maybe around 120 bpm or so) i sliced and diced for dad
item.dc:creator: DJ Kulio
item.itunes:summary: Some soulful breaks and beats (maybe around 120 bpm or so) i sliced and diced for dad

item.title: 2MuchLK (love&knowledge) (summer 2006) [BRAZILIAN DNB/MASH-UP]
item.description: A short cut-up of one of my all time fave dnb cuts, if not my all time fave, that I made for my sis, who happens to love the cut as well. item.title: Raggalicious (summer '06) [RAGGA JUNGLE]
item.description: A short but no doubt sweet mix of some ragga choons baked until golden brown, crunchy on the outside, raw on the inside. I did this mix as a practice set in preparation for my sister's wedding which was the following month. Probably my most fun "gig" ever (and we had to carry all my gear out to the island she got married on by boat!)
item.dc:creator: DJ Kulio
item.itunes:summary: A short but no doubt sweet mix of some ragga choons baked until golden brown, crunchy on the outside, raw on the inside. I did this mix as a practice set in preparation for my sister's wedding which was the following month. Probably my most fun "gig" ever (and we had to carry all my gear out to the island she got married on by boat!)

item.title: Make the Rumba Bounce (summer 2006? i think) [BRAZILIAN DNB]
item.description: A short mash-up of Brazilian dnb from the Rumba Sessions EP
item.dc:creator: DJ Kulio
item.itunes:summary: A short mash-up of Brazilian dnb from the Rumba Sessions EP

item.title: Art.ificial s(t)imulation (you got a friend) [JUNGLE/DNB]
item.description: More funky jungle and jazzed-out drumnbass. Peep the soul intro and outro on this slab of Koolie-funk.
item.dc:creator: DJ Kulio
item.itunes:summary: More funky jungle and jazzed-out drumnbass. Peep the soul intro and outro on this slab of Koolie-funk.

item.title: Bittersweets [JUNGLE/DNB]
item.description: more feel(real)good drumnbass - will post tracklisting eventually
item.dc:creator: DJ Kulio
item.itunes:summary: more feel(real)good drumnbass - will post tracklisting eventually

item.title: Aural Sex [HIP-HOP/JUNGLE/DNB]
item.description: One part hip-hop, one part drumnbass, a lotta good f*cking music. I think this is maybe the second mix I ever committed to a recording since I started DJing. already back then i had problems trying to pigeonhole the craft into one genre and so i said fuck it, imma mix both hiphop and drumnbass. The rest as they say is hizzo. At the time this mix was cut I went by the name nipps, which explains the name on the image for this podcast.
item.dc:creator: DJ Kulio
item.itunes:summary: One part hip-hop, one part drumnbass, a lotta good f*cking music. I think this is maybe the second mix I ever committed to a recording since I started DJing. already back then i had problems trying to pigeonhole the craft into one genre and so i said fuck it, imma mix both hiphop and drumnbass. The rest as they say is hizzo. At the time this mix was cut I went by the name nipps, which explains the name on the image for this podcast.

item.title: Here comes the rain again (and again) [HOUSE/BREAKS/ECLECTIC]
item.description: The Eurhythmics set off this mishmash of 80s, breakbeat, and eclectic cuts.
item.dc:creator: DJ Kulio
item.itunes:summary: The Eurhythmics set off this mishmash of 80s, breakbeat, and eclectic cuts.
